summary: One of my all-time favourite sweeties as a child were Bassetts Jelly Babies.  And I mean the original flour dusted version, not the more recent chewier Maynards imitations.  As anyone who is a regular reader to this blog might know by now is, most of my favourite things have came to me by way of my family...
title: Jelly Baby Gal
